author: swagata87
body:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42607, as requested in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42607#issuecomment-1966358677. Seems urgent from this comment by @RSalvatico in original PR: 

> There is also a chance to test the custom nano production this week if we manage to integrate it,
title: [14_0_X] Custom nano for e/gamma
